django.contrib.gis.db.models.proxy
==================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.db.models.proxy

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   The SpatialProxy object allows for lazy-geometries and lazy-rasters. The proxy
   uses Python descriptors for instantiating and setting Geometry or Raster
   objects corresponding to geographic model fields.

   Thanks to Robert Coup for providing this functionality (see #4322).



Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.db.models.proxy.SpatialProxy


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: SpatialProxy(klass, field, load_func=None)

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.db.models.query_utils.DeferredAttribute`
